sense.name: take intellectual property illegally
sense.examples: This writer plunders from famous authors. John plundered his final paper from a classmate. Students must be careful of plundering each other's ideas.

sense.name: rob, take as spoils
sense.examples: During the earthquake people plundered the deserted stores. The barbarians plundered the land. Lets turn this room into a pirate ship and plunder each other.

sense.name: rape, violate
sense.examples: The soldiers plundered the beautiful country. The marauders plundered indescriminately. Jerome plunders women and treasure alike.
